# Pull Review Template

## Review Summary

- Decision: `Approve` / `Request changes` / `Comment`
- Scope reviewed:
- Risk level: `Low` / `Medium` / `High`

## Functional correctness

- [ ] Change does what it claims
- [ ] No obvious regressions in touched areas
- [ ] Edge cases considered

## Backwards compatibility

- [ ] No breaking behaviour introduced
- [ ] If breaking, linked discussion and migration path are provided

## Code quality

- [ ] Follows existing patterns/conventions
- [ ] Types are clear and appropriate
- [ ] Logic is readable and maintainable

## Tests and validation

- [ ] Relevant unit tests added/updated
- [ ] `bun run lint` passes
- [ ] `bun run test` passes
- [ ] Test coverage for changed behaviour is sufficient

## Documentation

- [ ] README/docs updated where needed
- [ ] API changes are documented (props/emits/slots/types)

## AI-assisted code checks

- [ ] PR is labelled `AI Generated` (if applicable)
- [ ] AI-generated changes and impact are clearly documented
- [ ] Due diligence and manual verification are evident

## Required follow-ups

List any required changes before approval.
